call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain 2025: A Year of Real Progress | What Comes Next

topics.title: ChainCash and Basis Framework Progress
topics.summary: Discussion of ChainCash and Basis frameworks for off-chain cash systems that have been in development for 3-4 years. These systems enable peer-to-peer, bot-to-bot, and AI-to-AI transactions with mesh network capabilities for forest payments and blockchain reserves.

topics.title: Subblogs Development and Testing Progress
topics.summary: Subblogs have been in DevNet testing for months with white paper nearly complete except security sections. Public white paper release planned after New Year with deployment discussions to follow.

topics.title: 2025 Ecosystem Development Overview
topics.summary: Review of successful derivatives launches in 2025 including Dexy Gold, Gluon, and the use stablecoin. Discussion of the unstoppable hackathon and new developer participation in the ecosystem.

topics.title: Three Fundamental Blockchain Industry Challenges
topics.summary: Richi outlines three core problems blockchain must solve: secure decentralized ledger with finite supply, scalable algorithmic stablecoin, and private fair DeFi. He criticizes the industry's focus on trivial applications rather than fundamental monetary problems.

topics.title: Use Stablecoin Development and 2026 Plans
topics.summary: Focus on developing the Dexy use stablecoin protocol as a solution to algorithmic stablecoin challenges. The first million use in circulation is identified as the biggest milestone, with detailed roadmap for 2026 development.

topics.title: Crux Finance Acquisition and Platform Plans
topics.summary: Richi acquired Crux Finance as a development platform for use stablecoin. Plans include making it a top tools platform for Ergo with use-centric trading pairs, bank monitoring dashboard, and preserving existing tax features.

topics.title: Market Focus vs Architecture Quality Debate
topics.summary: Discussion of how crypto markets prioritize noise and liquidity over solid architecture and design. The conversation addresses industry's failure to innovate on fundamentals, with examples like Hyperliquid's opaque architecture.

topics.title: 2025 Ergo Ecosystem Achievements Review
topics.summary: Overview of 2025 progress including Duckpools V2, Rosen Bridge BSC integration, Bitcoin meta protocol development, fiat on/off-ramp wallet integration, and Machina peer-to-peer DEX design development.

topics.title: VC Industry Problems and Market Rationality
topics.summary: Criticism of crypto VCs who immediately dump tokens after unlock, contrasting with traditional VC 5-10 year investment horizons. Discussion of how crypto VCs buy discounted tokens rather than investing in technology or ideas.

topics.title: Money Principles and Insider Seigniorage Issues
topics.summary: Discussion of fundamental monetary principles and how massive insider seigniorage contradicts good money characteristics. Comparison between Bitcoin's clear value proposition and unclear Web3 pitches in modern crypto.

topics.title: Lithos Mining Pool Protocol Progress
topics.summary: Update on Lithos testnet development addressing proof-of-work centralization issues. Third version release planned with fraud proofs and optimization, positioned as a solution to mining variance and censorship problems.

topics.title: Rosen Bridge Development and Contribution Standards
topics.summary: Focus on open contribution standards for Rosen Bridge allowing external developers to understand and participate. Multiple chains integrating including Handshake, Fiero, and Nervos, with research on Monero implementation published.

topics.title: Raffle V2 and Cross-Chain Applications
topics.summary: Development of Raffle v2 protocol extension with multi-winner support and cross-chain liquidity access. Vision for replicating lottery systems with enforceable honesty and potential nonprofit fundraising applications.

topics.title: Exchange Environment and Arbitrage Opportunities
topics.summary: Discussion of arbitrage possibilities through BSC liquidity pools on exchanges like GATE and BitGet. Addresses 2025 exchange failures including TradeOgre shutdown and challenges for proof-of-work assets getting listed.

topics.title: Exchange Listing Requirements and Better Money
topics.summary: Critique of exchanges requiring token supply donations for listings, which contradicts principles of good money. Discussion of how exchanges push for worse money creation and the general industry problems in 2025.

topics.title: Ergo Stability and Development Funding
topics.summary: Ergo ecosystem remained stable through 2025 with focus on development rather than drama. Network upgrade 6.0 activated, successful fundraising for development occurred, and stable-to-stable liquidity pools bounty considered.

topics.title: Cross-Chain Integration Strategy for Stablecoins
topics.summary: Plans for use stablecoin liquidity on BSC starting January 1st, 2026. Strategy to replace TradeOgre for miners with decentralized trading paths and expand to other proof-of-work chains integrating with Rosen.

topics.title: 2026 Development Expectations and Fast Blocks
topics.summary: Expectations for 2026 including fast block implementation for native DeFi, security assumption monitoring for cross-chain liquidity growth, and potential use protocol enhancements. Plans for privacy integration and Midnight network connection.

topics.title: SDK Development and Wallet Integration Goals
topics.summary: Vision for SDK development enabling wallet integration and widget implementation for Rosen Bridge. Strategy to work with smaller responsive ecosystems rather than competing in crowded larger chains.

topics.title: Block Reward Emission Schedule Changes
topics.summary: Discussion of upcoming block reward reductions with final reduction in April 2026 leading to 0.85% yearly inflation rate similar to Bitcoin. This represents transition from high inflation period to stable long-term emission complemented by demurrage.

topics.title: Multi-Token Mining and Lithos Launch
topics.summary: Plans for Lithos as first proof-of-work token emission and merged mine sidechains to provide additional security subsidies for miners. Comparison to Litecoin ecosystem's multi-token mining approach as Ergo emission decreases.

topics.title: Fiat Currency Failures and Better Money Need
topics.summary: Discussion of Iranian rial collapse as example of ongoing fiat currency failures worldwide. Emphasis on crypto industry's disappointment in delivering promised peer-to-peer money solutions and Ergo's adherence to first principles.

topics.title: AI Development Tools and Future Challenges
topics.summary: Reflection on using AI-based coding for Basis tracker development while maintaining manual contract review. Discussion of rapidly changing AI tooling landscape and challenges even experts face in keeping up with developments.
